content: twisted turban wrap by hayley nordstrom t o make yarn c ast on 24 stitches approximately 70 yards of bulky weight yarn row 1 slip one knitwise *p2 k2* repeat i used plymouth yarns taria tweed from * until 1 stitch from end of row k1 row 2 slip one purlwise *k2 p2* repeat needles from * until 1 stitch before end of row p1 us size 8 5 mm spare cable needle repeat row 1 and 2 until piece measures 10 5 inches from co edge gauge 18 stitches and 23 row = 4inch square cable row slip first 12 stitches onto cable in stockinette using us size 8 5 0 mm needle and hold in front work next 12 stitches in pattern knit 12 stitches from cable needle finished size in pattern band circumference 20 5 inches 52 cm note this section is going to feel tight and width 3 5 inches 9 cm weird because it is a very wide cable don t worry it is right continue a few row and it will spread back out next row return to working in row 1 row 2 pattern as before you may start with either a knit or purl first depending on where you started the cable determine based on row immediately prior continue to work in row 1 row 2 until piece measures 20 5 inches from co edge bind off seam ends together using a whipstitch
